post.title: I Hate Going Home
post.content:
stuffed inside the bus. then changed a few lines in the underground. voilà! here come little dogs and cats, and home.\ At home, I am nothing. Everything I do is wrong, inappropriate, unacceptable,impolite, reckless, stupid.\ bad apples, unwashed jeans. these are my sins. but there’s no guilt inside.\ I must leave, and never come back.

Created by X&Y
